reply_to.body: How the heck to I put a screen shot on here
reply_to.body_tagged: How the heck to I put a screen shot on here

replies.body:
1. use imgur.com

2. click upload image

3. find your .mincraft> screen shots

4. choose the screen shots you want to upload.

5. Press upload

6. wait (hardest step)

7. copy and past onto here :)
replies.body_tagged:
1. use imgur.com

2. click upload image

3. find your .mincraft> screen shots

4. choose the screen shots you want to upload.

5. Press upload

6. wait (hardest step)

7. copy and past onto here :)
